channel.title: Training on A sea kayak story
channel.description: Recent content in Training on A sea kayak story

item.title: Training
item.description: Not the actual trip, just training mapped on chart to have an idea of what the real thing might take. Since 2014 building on-water confidence, with C2TC Sea Kayak Coaching in NS. May 14, 2023, 1000 km on ergo! 28 days on ergo, 263 nautical miles, 490 km Stats March 10, 2023, lap1 33 days on ergo, 281 nautical miles, 522 km Stats Xeon is a heavy-use Kayak Ergometer, that gives a true feel of on-the-water paddling.
